title: 12/30/20 - HOUR-3 - Jonathan Vilma & Playoff or Takeoff
itunes:title: 12/30/20 - HOUR-3 - Jonathan Vilma & Playoff or Takeoff
description:
NFL on FOX analyst Jonathan Vilma joins the show to tell Colin what the Eagles should do at the QB position with Carson Wentz and Jalen Hurts. He also gives his playoff predictions before the final week of the NFL regular season in a segment called Playoff or Takeoff.

 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
